content: What about jail time?! Why are these executives allowed to remain outside of the prison system? They, as the uberrich, are just paying back chump change. I want such egregious acts to be punished by time -- time away from being free and being with family and away from making more money. 10-20 years minimum. Maybe they (or the next round of such criminals) can be afraid enough of the punishment that they won't do this again. Isn't that how it's supposed to work?
